rule.name: Avoid_JPA_EagerFetching
rule.description:
Eager fetching is discouraged in the "Java Persistence with Hibernate" book, as well as by Vlad Mihalcea, one of the top Hibernate commiters as well as author of "High-Performance Java Persistence". See https://vladmihalcea.com/eager-fetching-is-a-code-smell/
@ManyToOne and @OneToOne are EAGER by default, so one should explicitly use fetch = FetchType.LAZY with them.
